review: Chrome cast is a great idea. But the only protection it has is your WiFi password and anyone can hack in and use your tv for what they want if they have your wifi they have your chromecast at there disposal. There should be a password protection on it

review: Bought one of these for myself and one for my son for Christmas.  Low and behold, on Christmas morning he had done the same thing.  I have thoroughly enjoyed mine.  Since I'm not a fan of any kind of sports, it's a godsend when I'd really rather watch something else than football.  Now if they would show us the halftime shows instead of a bunch of comments, predictions and utter nonsence, I might be enticed to watch football again.  I dearly love to see the bands.  Til then, I'll stick to my Chromecast.
author: Duchessmine "Duchessmine"
